text: ICE detainees are again being held at the Wyatt Detention Facility, raising concerns from @RIACLU. About 10 ago, ICE ended its contract with Wyatt after a detainee died there, sparking scrutiny and an ACLU suit.

text: All 88 people had outstanding warrants of some sort and weren’t eligible for benefits, police say.

text: Some of the people arrested on this sweep of public assistance fraud arrests had warrants for violent crimes, state police say, including attempted murder
author: bamaral44

text: Here at state police headquarters for a news conference on the arrests and arrest warrants of nearly 90 people on public assistance fraud charges. Should start soon.

text: Drea Kelly detailed years of abuse she said she experienced at the hands of her ex-husband, with details so universal several women in the crowd nodded along with her. One thing makes it stand out: Her ex-husband is R. Kelly.

text: Clark Murray Jr., accused in the stabbing death of his father, “will not be formally charged until he is capable of understanding the charges,” police said tonight. “In his current state that is not possible.”

text: 3 suspects in custody after @ProvidenceRIPD quickly respond to a home invasion, leading to a lengthy standoff that came to a peaceful conclusion. w/ @AmandaMilkovits Here's what we know so far:
author: bamaral44

text: Standoff in Providence has now ended peacefully. Started as a home invasion, according to police.
author: bamaral44

text: This situation looks like it’s coming to an end. SWAT members leaving the house.
author: bamaral44

text: More than one person has been taken from the house in the last few minutes.  One, at least, was in cuffs.
author: bamaral44

text: Just now: police have taken a child out of the house on Norwich Ave. where there’s an ongoing public safety situation.
author: bamaral44

text: Still very little happening at the scene as the sun rises here. Police milling around on the porch, firefighters down the street with ambulances.
author: bamaral44

text: From earlier this morning —>

text: Lots of police and firefighters on the scene centered at a home on Norwich Ave.

text: A school in Providence is closed today due to a police situation. Projo is on the way to the scene.

text: James Manni's life has taken some unexpected turns, like the time he met his wife thanks to George H.W. Bush (long story). But this is one he's been preparing for his whole career: Taking over the Rhode Island State Police.
